kiali.title: Troubleshooting Empty Kiali Graph
kiali.description: Troubleshooting guide for when the Kiali Service Mesh graph shows no nodes or traffic. Covers common causes like missing sidecars, idle traffic, incorrect namespace selection, and time range settings.

kiali.title: Kiali Health Configuration Guide
kiali.description: Configuration guide for customizing how Kiali calculates health. Includes setting thresholds for error rates and latency, and configuring custom health checks for workloads.

kiali.title: Kiali Distributed Tracing Integration
kiali.description: Guide on integrating distributed tracing (Jaeger, Tempo, OpenTelemetry) with Kiali. Explains how to view trace spans correlated with metrics and troubleshoot missing trace data.

kiali.title: Kiali Configuration Validations
kiali.description: Reference for Kiali's semantic validations of Istio objects. Explains specific error codes (KIAxxxx) for VirtualServices, DestinationRules, and Gateways, and how to resolve them.

kiali.title: Kiali Installation Guide
kiali.description: Comprehensive guide for installing Kiali using the Kiali Operator or Helm Charts. Covers prerequisites, deployment strategies, and verification steps.

kiali.title: Kiali Authentication Strategies
kiali.description: Documentation on configuring Kiali access control. Details supported authentication strategies including Anonymous, OpenID Connect, Openshift, and Token-based login.

kiali.title: Kiali Istio Wizards
kiali.description: Guide to using Kiali's UI wizards for generating Istio configuration. Includes wizards for Request Routing, Fault Injection, Traffic Shifting, and Circuit Breaking.

kiali.title: Kiali Multi-Cluster Configuration
kiali.description: Guide for configuring Kiali to view and manage a multi-cluster Istio mesh. Covers the unified dashboard setup and granting Kiali access to remote cluster kubeconfigs.

kiali.title: Debugging Kiali Server
kiali.description: Instructions for debugging the Kiali server itself. Includes changing log levels (trace/debug), accessing operator logs, and profiling performance issues.

kiali.title: Kiali Prometheus Configuration
kiali.description: Configuration details for connecting Kiali to Prometheus. Includes tuning caching parameters for performance and handling custom Prometheus URLs or authentication.

istio.title: Istio Mutual TLS Migration
istio.description: Step-by-step guide for migrating services to Mutual TLS (mTLS). Explains how to configure PeerAuthentication policies and verify encryption status.

istio.title: Istio Traffic Shifting (Canary Rollouts)
istio.description: Task guide for gradually migrating traffic from an old version of a microservice to a new one (Canary Deployment) using VirtualServices and percentage-based weights.

istio.title: Istio Circuit Breaking Fundamentals
istio.description: Guide to configuring circuit breakers in Istio to prevent cascading failures. Covers Outlier Detection, Connection Pool settings, and Max Requests configuration.

istio.title: Istio Authorization Policies
istio.description: Task guide for setting up access control using AuthorizationPolicy. Explains how to allow or deny traffic based on namespace, service accounts, and HTTP methods.

istio.title: Istio Ingress Gateway Setup
istio.description: Guide to exposing internal services to the external world using the Istio Ingress Gateway. Covers Gateway resources, VirtualService binding, and TLS termination.

istio.title: Istio VirtualService Reference
istio.description: Technical reference for the VirtualService CRD. Defines traffic routing rules, match conditions (headers, URI), retries, timeouts, and destination weighting.

istio.title: Istio DestinationRule Reference
istio.description: Technical reference for the DestinationRule CRD. Defines policies that apply after routing, including LoadBalancer settings, Subsets (versions), and outlier detection.

istio.title: Istio Sidecar Injection
istio.description: Explanation of how the Envoy sidecar proxy is injected into pods. Covers automatic injection via namespace labeling and manual injection using istioctl.

istio.title: Diagnose Configuration with Istioctl Analyze
istio.description: Guide to using 'istioctl analyze' to detect potential issues with Istio configuration. Helps identify validation errors, missing resources, and misconfigurations.

istio.title: Configuring Request Timeouts
istio.description: Task guide on configuring HTTP request timeouts in Istio. Explains how to use VirtualServices to abort requests that take too long to respond.

istio.title: Istio Fault Injection
istio.description: Guide to injecting artificial faults (delays or aborts) into the service mesh to test application resilience and failure recovery mechanisms.

istio.title: Istio Kubernetes Gateway API
istio.description: Instructions for using the modern Kubernetes Gateway API (Gateway, HTTPRoute) with Istio as an alternative to the classic Istio Gateway/VirtualService resources.

istio.title: Istio Traffic Mirroring
istio.description: Task guide on shadowing (mirroring) live traffic to a separate service version for testing purposes without affecting the production response.

istio.title: JWT Access Control
istio.description: Guide to enforcing access control based on JSON Web Tokens (JWT). Covers RequestAuthentication resources and AuthorizationPolicy rules.

istio.title: Istio WorkloadEntry Reference
istio.description: Reference for the WorkloadEntry CRD, used to onboard non-Kubernetes workloads (VMs, bare metal) into the Istio Service Mesh.
